room_details.description: This is an air-conditioned spacious room that is enough to accommodate a family of 3 adults and 1 child or 3 adults. It has one full bathroom with shower and tub and includes free toiletries. Streamlined rooms offer minibars, complimentary Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, plus tea and coffeemakers. Room service is available 24/7. Rooms are non-smoking and baby cots are available on request free of charge subject to availability. Take advantage of a free shuttle bus from the hotel to the shopping centre and beaches.

This Family Interconnecting room features 2 bedrooms with custom made extra large size twin beds and king size bed. Room facilities include a safe, air-conditioning, desk, ironing facilities, sitting area and a minibar. 2 bathrooms are offered at this room type and are fitted with a shower and bath. The rooms are generously proportioned and beautifully furnished offering you the perfect ambience to relax and unwind while carrying on with your business. Rooms are non-smoking and baby cots are available on request free of charge subject to availability. Take advantage of a free shuttle bus from the hotel to the shopping centre and beaches.
